name: Surventy v.20SGJ
description:
Some strange robots have appeared on your planet, what are their intentions?

Game

You have to survive until the time is up. Will you be able to survive ?

20 seconds!!! 20 seconds is all the time that you have.

This version is for 20 Second Game Jam, I will release a version with more content. Controls Key BoardControllerMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft JoystickAcceptEnter / SpaceA / XPauseEscStart Sofware used:
  • Unity 2021.312f1
  • Bfxr
  • Aseprite
  • Music Maker
Links of interest:
  • 04b_30 letter font: https://www.dafont.com/es/04b-30.font
  • Minecraft letter font: https://www.dafont.com/es/minecraft.font
